Feature Notes:

Ranger Archetype: 1 selection
By Popular Demand: Can receive welcome and lodging in exchange for performing
Darkvision: R60' Sees one light level better
Exceptional Training: Can use a bonus action to command companion to Dash, Disengage, or Help instead of Attack/Companion attacks count as magical
Ranger's Companion: Companion beast of up to CR 1/4 obeys commands and gains +4 Armor Class, attack, damage, and proficient skills and saving throws

Combat
Hit Points: 70 Initiative: 3 Armor Class: 13 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Firearms; Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (+7 1+3 R25/100); Greatclub (+8 1d8+4); Mace (+8 1d6+4); Unarmed (+8 1+4)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +30
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +3
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Initiate: Knows 1 Fighting Style
Gunner: Weapon Proficiency (Firearms)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Strength Damage Adjustment: +4
Crusher: Can move a foe up to 1 size larger 5' with a bludgeoning hit once per rd, and a critical bludgeoning hit gives allies advantage on attacks on that foe for 1 rd
Favored Foe: Can mark a target with a successful attack for concentration up to 1 min 4 times per long rest; the first hit each rd on a marked foe inflicts +1d6 HP weapon damage
Fighting Initiate: Can replace a Fighting Style when boosting an ability or taking a feat
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed melee weapon
Gunner: Loading does not slow firearm attacks, and being adjacent to a foe does not inflict disadvantage on ranged attacks
Martial Versatility: Can replace a Fighting Style or maneuver when boosting an ability or taking a feat
Piercer: Can reroll 1 piercing damage die once per rd and adds 1 die to piercing critical damage
Poisoner: Attacks negate poison resistance/Can use a bonus action to coat a weapon with poison lasting 1 min that inflicts 2d8 HP poison and the poisoned condition (save DC 14 Constitution negates) for 1 rd
Slasher: Can inflict -10 Speed for 1 rd with a slashing attack, and a critical slashing hit inflicts disadvantage on the foe's attacks for 1 rd
Telekinetic: R30' Can use a bonus action to move a target 5' (save DC 12 + ability modifier Strength negates)
Tireless: Can gain 1d8+4 temporary hit points 4 times per long rest, and a short rest reduces exhaustion by 1
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Strength
Save: Charisma: 3; Constitution: 3; Dexterity: 7; Intelligence: 1; Strength: 8; Wisdom: 4
Save Notes:
Fey Ancestry: Has advantage vs. charm and immunity to magical sleep
Land's Stride: Has advantage vs. impeding plants
Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 2; A1: 1; R1: 4; R2: 3; R3: 2 Attack: A: 5; R: 8 Spell DC: A: 13; R: 16
Spells:
Beast Sense (R2 Divi): Self can perceive through a touched willing beast's senses for concentration up to 1 hr [R]
Beast Sense (R2 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Self can perceive through a touched willing beast's senses for concentration up to 1 hr [R]
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four arrows or crossbow bolts attack non-designated creatures within 30', inflicting 1d6 HP piercing each (save Dexterity negates), for 8 hr [+Level affects +2 pieces]
Cure Wounds (R1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+4 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Detect Thoughts (Telepathic2 [Telepathic] Divi): R30' Reveals targets' surface thoughts and allows probing deeper (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Disguise Self (A1 Illu): Changes the appearance of self body and clothing for 1 hr; physical investigation detects the illusion
Elemental Weapon (R3 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and +1d4 HP damage of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2 or +3 attack and +2d4 or +3d4 damage at level 5 or 7]
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Next successful self attack restrains the foe and inflicts 1d6 HP per rd piercing (save Strength ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Find Traps (R2 Divi): R120' Reveals the presence of traps
Fog Cloud (R1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the radius by 20']
Invisibility (Shadow Touched2 [Shadow Touched] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Mage Hand (Telekinetic0 [Telekinetic] Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Misty Step (Fey Touched2 [Fey Touched] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Causes plants in a 100' radius to overgrow or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 year
Ray Of Frost (A0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Searing Smite (R1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +1d6 HP fire, plus 1d6 HP fire per rd (save Constitution ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP initial]
Speak With Animals (R1 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Self can talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Speak With Plants (R3 [Primal Awareness] Tran): Self can talk with and command plants for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Artificer Initiate: Knows 1 artificer cantrip and can cast a chosen A1 spell once per long rest
Eldritch Adept: Knows 1 Eldritch Invocation
Eldritch Spear: Increases Eldritch Blast range to 300'
Metamagic Adept: Knows 2 Metamagic options and has 2 Sorcery Points
Chef: Food prepared during a short rest adds 1d8 to hit points regained from using Hit Dice by 8 diners, and treats prepared during a long rest give 4 eaters 4 temporary hit points within 8 hr
Distant Spell: Can spend 1 Sorcery Point to double the range of a spell or to give a touch spell a 30' range
Eldritch Adept: Can replace Eldritch Invocation when gaining a level
Fey Touched: Can cast Misty Step and a chosen level 1 divination or enchantment spell once per long rest
Metamagic Adept: Can replace a Metamagic option when boosting an ability or taking a feat
Nature's Veil: Can use a bonus action to become invisible for 1 rd 4 times per long rest
Primal Awareness: Can cast Speak With Plants, Beast Sense, and Speak With Animals once each per long rest
Shadow Touched: Can cast Invisibility and a chosen level 1 illusion or necromancy spell once per long rest
Spellcasting Focus: Can use a druidic focus for ranger spells
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the ranger spell list
Subtle Spell: Can spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast a spell without somatic or verbal components
Telekinetic: Knows the Mage Hand cantrip
Telepathic: Can cast Detect Thoughts (DC 12 + ability modifier Wisdom negates) once per long rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Feat Allocation: 2 available vs. 15 allocated
